interval_container.name: Aeolian 3
interval_container.description:
order: 5th degree of melodic minor (M.M.) = M.M. V
comments: - aelolian with 3 instead of b3 - sometimes used as mixolydian with b6 instead of 6 = mixolydian b6 - rarely used as mixolydian b13

interval_container.name: Aeolian 6 7
interval_container.description:
order: 1st degree of melodic minor (M.M.) = M.M. I
comments: - developed out of Harmonic Minor (H.M.) - 1st half is a minor tetrachord - 2nd half is a major tetrachord - development: N.M. (...b6-b7) -> H.M.(...b6-7) -> M.M. (...6-7)
